works.complaint:
Hi there
There are a number of reviews on this page which we believe have been  
created by an ex employee and a competitor who are possibly working  
together to falsify information. We have not received any negative reviews
 
of the business and are growing financially, however there was a situation
 
with an employee where he was dismissed for theft, and also a competitor  

who would call the business under the pretence that he was a potential  
client and threatened the business as well. We discovered fake posts on  
Whirlpool forums. The format which they follow is similar, where he  
slanders the owner Nick Bell and claims similar scenario. On Whirlpool,  
this person has said the same thing as this post on Google Reviews: The
guy  
who runs this company makes money from registering domain names similar to
 
yours and then he makes a template site that looks like your site, then he
 
makes a logo that looks like yours. Then he tries to sell you the domain  

for $10000 ! Avoid this schmuck like the plague.
  We have had it removed from Whirlpool. He has also set up multiple  
accounts so it looks like a genuine conversation flowing.  We have police 

reports on the ex employee, and also the competitor's threats, although we
 
believe the bulk of this may be from the competitor. The time of writing  

and styles is similar.
We can provide legal documentation to prove both.
If you will notice in multiple posts, the 'reviewer' says the same thing  

about us building links to other sites, and also that their providers told
 
them this is wrong.
We please urge you to look into this carefully, it is distressing to the  

business owner and completely false. We dont know how much damage there
has  
been because of these reviews and I am slowly uncovering these.
Please help us, and you are more than welcome to contact me or the
business  
owner to verify what we are saying is true.
Thank you
